promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young special wolf psychic-type pokemon wearing purple cosmic armor. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptopulse, a a young special wolf psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Flip Over. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "psychic" or "Cryptopulse". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, wolf-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Encountered in crypt-like confines, this mystical lupine entity masters the art of mind manipulation. Its "Flip Over" ability stirs chaos.
